articles.author: Jacob Steinberg
articles.title: Chelsea owner Todd Boehly vows to bring success after completing takeover - The Guardian
articles.description: Todd Boehly promised to build on Chelsea’s ‘remarkable history of success’ after the American’s consortium completed its £4.25bn takeover
articles.content:
